name: European Federation Historic Aviation
membership: The EFHA was initiatiated by the National Federation Historic Aviation Netherlands (NFHL) chairman Harry Haas and lead by the NFHL commission European affairs and Liebre Public Affairs.
goal: Sensible rules and regulations for historic aviation so  historic aircraft, deemed historic by the EU, can be demonstrated to audiences in the whole of Europe.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Taxation, Transport
